text: Rijo or Rijō may refer to: ==People== * Audris Rijo (b. 1985), a Dominican professional model and actress * José Rijo (b. 1965), a Dominican former baseball player * Luis Rijo (1927–2001), a Uruguayan footballer * Wanda Rijo (b. 1979), a Dominican former weightlifter * Washington García Rijo (1921–2010), a Uruguayan political figure ==Other uses== * , sometimes called * , a Japanese amateur football club
